summary: Gives Rayya, the Falkreath Housecarl added in the Hearthfire DLC a new look
descriptionHtml:
as there was only 2 mods i could find (not sure if other housecarl compilation mods added or not) any mods that gave the Falkreath Housecarl \"Rayya\" added in the Hearthfire DLC a Non-bald look.
i decided to give a shot at NPC editing with the creation kit to give her a simple makeover, and hair!!
in addition to the makeover, i tweaked her agressiveness down to \"unagressive\" as well as made Essential and ticked the \"Does Not Affect Stealth Meter\" tab in the CK so she may be better at sneaking or at very least not giving u away as easily.
 her starting armor was changed to the Scaled Armor and her dual Schimitars were changed into an orcish sword and skyforge steel sword primarily cause i found the \"stacking\" in the trade menu somewhat annoying

Uploaded version that merely gives her Redguard Vanilla Hair for those who dont have ApachiiSkyHair (why, idk)


Requirements:
Skyrim version 1.7.7.0.6 or higher along with the Update.esp
Hearthfire DLC
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiSkyHair[/URL] by Apachii


Mods used in Pic :
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiSkyHair[/URL] by Apachii
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20884]UNP Replacer Configuration Package[/URL] by sillumlt
[URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19772]Remodeled Armors - UNP version - Originally by Mak07 for CBBEv3M by asianboy345[/URL] by asianboy345



Credits:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the Hearthfire DLC ofc ;o
Apachii for allowing me to use her hair mod

Warning: she may look different for you depending on your installed mods
author: Motionless47
